mapper.select: SELECT writer, title, imagePath, viewCount FROM event_mp ORDER BY num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_mp (num, writer, title, content, imagePath, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(event_mp_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imagePath}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, imagePath, viewCount, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum FROM event_mp ORDER BY num DESC) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
